trans-unit.source: Converts managed <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> objects to unmanaged Graphics Device Interface (GDI) [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structures, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 将托管<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>对象到非托管图形设备接口 (GDI) [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: None of the methods of this class will validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 此类的方法都不能将验证<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要对其进行验证，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> class for the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>类的指定打印机。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: DEVMODE 结构的详细信息，请参阅[DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the printer that is bound to the new <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到新的打印机的名称<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The Print Schema version to use in the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> and DEVMODE conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要在中使用的打印架构版本<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>和 DEVMODE 转换。

trans-unit.source: deviceName is .
trans-unit.target: deviceNameis .

trans-unit.source: clientPrintSchemaVersion is 0 or less.
trans-unit.target: clientPrintSchemaVersion小于或等于 0。

trans-unit.source: The converter was unable to bind to deviceName.
trans-unit.target: 无法将绑定到转换器 deviceName 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)给托管代码的结构<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: DEVMODE 结构的详细信息，请参阅[DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565)。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the returned <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> is the entire print job.
trans-unit.target: 返回的作用域<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>是整个打印作业。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会验证<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要对其进行验证，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the DEVMODE structure.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>包含 DEVMODE 结构的数组。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The new managed <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的托管<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>已释放。

trans-unit.source: The value of devMode is .
trans-unit.target: The value of devMode is .

trans-unit.source: The content of devMode is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 内容 devMode 格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that has the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)给托管代码的结构<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>具有指定的范围。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会验证<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要对其进行验证，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: DEVMODE 结构的详细信息，请参阅[DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> buffer containing the DEVMODE structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>缓冲区包含 DEVMODE 结构要转换。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"></xref> value that specifies whether the new <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> applies to a page, a document, or an entire print job.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"> </xref>值，该值指定是否新<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>适用于页、 文档或整个打印作业。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>已释放。

trans-unit.source: The value of devMode is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 值 devMode 为 null ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The content of devMode is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 内容 devMode 格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The scope is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: The scope is not a valid value.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified managed <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定的托管<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>指向非托管[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构，它基于[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构由标识<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> parameter must be the entire print job.
trans-unit.target: 作用域<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>参数必须是整个打印作业。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会验证<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要对其进行验证，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: DEVMODE 结构的详细信息，请参阅[DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>要转换。

trans-unit.source: A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.
trans-unit.target: 标识是否使用用户默认设置或打印机默认 DEVMODE 作为基 DEVMODE 的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>数组，其中包含新[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>已释放。

trans-unit.source: The value of printTicket is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 值 printTicket 为 null ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The content of printTicket is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 内容 printTicket 格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The baseType is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: The baseType is not a valid value.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified managed code <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> with the specified scope, into an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的托管的代码转换<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>与指定的作用域中，到非托管[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构，它基于[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构由标识<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会验证<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要对其进行验证，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: DEVMODE 结构的详细信息，请参阅[DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>要转换。

trans-unit.source: A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.
trans-unit.target: 标识是否使用用户默认设置或打印机默认 DEVMODE 作为基 DEVMODE 的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"></xref> value that specifies whether the conversion of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> should be done at the scope of a page, a document, or an entire print job.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"> </xref>值，该值指定是否转换<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>应在一个页面，一个文档或整个打印作业的作用域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> buffer that represents the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>缓冲区，它表示新[DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844)结构。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>已释放。

trans-unit.source: The value of printTicket is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 值 printTicket 为 null ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The content of printTicket is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 内容 printTicket 格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The baseType is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: The baseType is not a valid value.

trans-unit.source: -or- The scope is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: -or- The scope is not a valid value.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的资源<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> can support.
trans-unit.target: 获取最大值[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)版本， <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> </xref>可以支持。

trans-unit.source: The maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> can support.
trans-unit.target: 最大值[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)版本， <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> </xref>可以支持。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的所有资源<xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`在完成使用<xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.</xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>时

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法使<xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>中不可用状态。</xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>占用。</xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> </xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用`Dispose`在发布到<xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>。</xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>
